Site Blocker - Take Control of Your Online Experience

Site Blocker empowers you to take control of your online experience by allowing you to block specific websites with ease. Whether you need to enhance focus during work hours or manage online distractions, Site Blocker provides a simple solution. Key features include quick blocking/unblocking, personalized blocked pages, and easy management of blocked sites.

Key Features:

Quick Blocking/Unblocking: Easily block or unblock websites with just a few clicks.
Personalized Blocked Pages: Customize the blocked page with your own message and style.
Easy Management: View and manage the list of blocked sites at any time.

How to Use:

Enter the website URL you want to block.
Click "Block Site" to restrict access.
Manage blocked sites and customize the blocked page in the popup.
Enhance your productivity and regain control over your online activities with Site Blocker. Install now and experience a focused and distraction-free browsing environment.
